headline: BD Launches Landmark Cell Analyzer Featuring Breakthrough Spectral and Real-Time Cell Imaging Technologies
summary: BD (Becton, Dickinson and Company) (NYSE: BDX), a leading global medical technology company, announced the global commercial launch of the world's first cell analyzer featuring breakthrough spectral and real-time cell imaging technologies, enabling more researchers across a wider range of applications to uncover deeper insights and dynamics from cells once invisible in flow cytometry experiments – with increased ease and throughput.

content.title: BD Launches Landmark Cell Analyzer Featuring Breakthrough Spectral and Real-Time Cell Imaging Technologies
content.summary: BD (Becton, Dickinson and Company) (NYSE: BDX), a leading global medical technology company, announced the global commercial launch of the world's first cell analyzer featuring breakthrough spectral and real-time cell imaging technologies, enabling more researchers across a wider range of applications to uncover deeper insights and dynamics from cells once invisible in flow cytometry experiments – with increased ease and throughput.

thumbnail.caption: BD announced the launch of the BD FACSDiscover™ A8 Cell Analyzer, the world’s first cell analyzer featuring breakthrough spectral and real-time cell imaging technologies, enabling more researchers across a wider range of applications to uncover deeper insights and dynamics from cells once invisible in flow cytometry experiments. (PRNewsfoto/BD (Becton, Dickinson and Company))
